title: Invesco FTSE RAFI Developed Markets ex-U.S. (PXF) Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Wednesday, shares of the Invesco FTSE RAFI Developed Markets ex-U.S. ETF (Symbol: PXF) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $39.93, changing hands as high as $40.10 per share. Invesco FTSE RAFI Developed Markets ex-U.S. shares are currently trading up about 0.5% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of PXF shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, PXF's low point in its 52 week range is $36.211 per share, with $44.09 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $40.06.
